```{r}
setwd("C:/Users/HT Chen/Desktop/ISSS626/ISSS626-wp/Hands-on_Ex/Hands-on_Ex04")
hunan <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                 layer = "Hunan")
```

```{r}
setwd("C:/Users/HT Chen/Desktop/ISSS626/ISSS626-wp/Hands-on_Ex/Hands-on_Ex04")
hunan2012 <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_2012.csv")
```

```{r}
hunan_sf <- left_join(hunan,hunan2012) %>%
  select(1:3, 7, 15,16,31,32)
```

```{r}
hunan_sp <- hunan_sf %>%
  as_Spatial()
```

```{r}
bw_cv <- bw.gwr(GPEC = 1,
                data = hunan_sp,
                approach = "CV",
                adaptive = False,
                kernel = "bisquare",
                longlat = T)
```

```{r}
bw_AIC <- bw.gwr(GPEC = 1,
                data = hunan_sp,
                approach = "AIC",
                adaptive = FALSE,
                kernel = "bisquare",
                longlat = T)
```

```{r}
gwstat <- gwss(data = hunan_sp,
                approach = "GDPPC",
                adaptive = FALSE,
                kernel = "bisquare",
                longlat = T)
```
